price: 64. O, Profeet! Allah is voldoende voor jou en ook voor degenen van de gelovigen die jou volgen.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ حَسۡبُكَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nabiyu ḥasbuka al-lahu wamani ittabaʿaka mina al-mu'minīna
